maqras.text: He dictus Quod est vos up to O messengers
They dictus Nos dispatched criminal people
Nos shower them rocks clay
Signum tuus Dominus transgressors
Nos tunc delivered totus believers
Nos non invenit it absque 1 domus submitters
Nos set it lesson those fear painful retribution
(In Moses ibi est lesson). Nos sent eum Pharaoh manifest proofs
he turned in arrogance dictus Magician crazy
Consequently nos punished eum his troops Nos threw them sea he est 1 blame
(In â€˜Aad ibi est lesson). Nos sent them disastrous wind
Anything it advenit upon utterly destroyed
(In Thamoud ibi est lesson). They told Enjoy ex temporanea
They rebelled command their Dominus. Consequently lightning struck them prout they looked
They nunquam get nor they helped
people Noah ante ut; they est wicked people
Nos constructed caelum noster manus nos continue expand it
Nos factus terra habitable; perfect design
Nos created pair (vir femina) de everything ut vos take heed
Vos escape DEUS. Ego sent Eum vos prout manifest warner
perfecit non set DEUS any alius deus! Ego sent Eum vos prout manifest warner
Consistently when messenger iit proximus generations they dictus Magician Crazy
they factus agreement cum each alius Indeed they est transgressors
Vos disregard them; vos non blamed
Ac remind pro reminder benefits believers
Ego non create jinns humans absque worship Me alone
Ego need provisions them nor perfecit ego need them feed Me
DEUS est Provider Possessor TOTUS power Supreme
transgressors incurred same fate prout their proximus counterparts; they non challenge
Woe those disbelieved feria awaiting them
Montis. Sinai
actum scripture
Published in books
frequented Shrine
exalted ceiling
sea set aflame
Tuus Dominus requital est unavoidable
non force universe stop it
Feria advenit when caelum violently thunder
Montis wiped out
Woe ut feria to disbelievers
Qui est in their blundering heedless
They herded Gehenna forcibly
Hoc est Fire in vos used disbelieve
est hoc magic vos non vide
Suffer burning Vos est patient impatient it est the same pro vos! Hoc est just requital quod vos perfecit
righteous deserved gardens bliss
They enjoy quod their Dominus reserved them; their Dominus spared them retribution Hell
Eat drink happily in return tuus works
They relax luxurious furnishings nos match them beautiful conjux
Pro those believed their infans alias subsequentis them belief nos habet their infans ligatus them! Nos nunquam fail reward them any work Omnis person est paid pro quod he perfecit
Nos supply them fruits meats they love
They enjoy drinks nunquam polluted nunquam sinful drink
